titleStmt.title: A ternary of paradoxes the magnetick cure of wounds, nativity of tartar in wine, image of God in man / written originally by Joh. Bapt. Van Helmont and translated, illustrated and amplified by Walter Charleton.
titleStmt.author: Helmont, Jean Baptiste van, 1577-1644.
Charleton, Walter, 1619-1707.
Helmont, Franciscus Mercurius van, 1614-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Flesher for William Lee ...,

notesStmt.note: "To the learned Dr. Charleton, on his elegant translation" signed : "Thom. Philipot."
Imperfect: title page torn with loss of date.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
